XIII.i.8.A.2.b
.
Payment to Veterans in Receipt of MRP
A Veteran receiving military retired pay (MRP) is
not
required to waive any portion of MRP to receive a clothing allowance.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 8, Section A - Clothing Allowance
citation: Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 8, Section A
